company.name: Pingbhai
company.overview: PINGBHAI is a digital B2B platform revolutionizing procurement in India's electronics industry (ESDM & EMS). It addresses fragmentation and inefficiency by offering verified, structured product listings for equipment, factory consumables, and industrial software.
company.mission: To make procurement smarter, faster, and cooler for Indian MSMEs by providing a human-centric platform with clean interfaces and AI guidance.

contact.support: Dedicated onboarding & 'Ping Me' chat on listing pages
